directions: Simmer vinegar and onion for about 8 minutes, until onion is tender. Stir in prunes until warm, about 3 minutes.
Top each toast with: 1/4 ounce goat cheese, 3 arugula leaves, 1 tablespoon prune mixture, and 1/2 teaspoon walnuts.
ingredients: 12 (1/4 inch thick) slices sourdough baguette, toasted
title: Balsamic Prune & Goat Cheese Bruschetta
